title: Hour 1 - Russell Wilson, Tom Brady, Steve Beuerlein
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Russell Wilson, Tom Brady, Steve Beuerlein
description:
In hour one, Colin defends Russell Wilson and his critics call him "washed". Although he has taken some steps back in his once spectacular deep ball, he's still a very competent QB. Tom Brady makes headlines with his statement about the level of play that seems to have a strong hold on the league. And Steve Beuerlein joins to talk QB play and the NFL as well.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
